answers.author: Chase Carlile
answers.text:
Attached is the 2010 policy for Vermont's state agencies. Hopefully it is of some use to Sunnyvale.

author: Pamela Muse
text:
The City of Sunnyvale, CA is looking for copies of your open source software policies. As well, any documentation you may have re: guidelines for evaluating open source software, processes, criteria, etc. would be appreciated.
Thank you,
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450 Voice
480-231-3538 Text
Pmuse@transformgov.org
title: Open Source Sofware Policy
